title: Mant!
description: If a man and an ant are exposed to radiation simultaneously, the result would be terrible, indeed. For the result would be… Mant!
quote: I don’t suppose it makes much difference to you now, but you didn’t have a single cavity.
altHero: a human-sized ant (Mant) in a suit talks with a woman
alt1: a doctor shows a woman a diagram of the brain
alt2: a scientist scans Mant for radiation
alt3: a woman screams, the shadow of Mant attacking a man is cast on the wall behind her
alt4: a giant ant scales a tall building with spotlights on it from below
